title: Delivering a Staging Layer using BimlFlex
description: Conceptually, the Staging Layer of a data solution records the data in the data solution mostly the way it was received. In BimlFlex, the Staging Layer is mostly inferred - it is derived from the source Objects that have been imported into the solution for Connections that have been configured with a Source System Integration Stage ('source connections').
